import axios from "axios" import React from "react" const baseUrl = "https://passgen-server.herokuapp.com/" class App extends React.Component { constructor (props) { super(props) this.state = { amount: 8, ll: true, sl: true, num: true, sym: true, pswd: "" } } render() { return (
this.setState({ amount: e.target.value })}/>
this.setState({ ll: e.target.checked })} checked />
this.setState({ sl: e.target.checked })} checked />
this.setState({ num: e.target.checked })} checked />
this.setState({ sym: e.target.checked })} checked />


) } genBtn(amount, ll, sl, num, sym) { const data = {"amount": amount, "ll": ll, "sl": sl, "num": num, "sym": sym} axios.post(baseUrl, data) .then((function(response){ console.log(response.data) })) .catch(function (error) { console.log(error) }) console.log('Ok') } } export default App
